about_the_game:
Go on a mesmerizing journey into the world of timeless beauty with "House of Jigsaw: The Art of Still Life" DLC! Immerse yourself in a collection of captivating, colorful still life jigsaw puzzles that pay tribute to the artistry and tranquility of everyday objects. This DLC introduces a new level of elegance and challenge to the House of Jigsaw universe, providing an experience that will test your puzzle-solving skills in the most artistic way possible.

Unleash your inner art connoisseur and embark on a journey through the captivating world of "House of Jigsaw: The Art of Still Life" DLC. Explore the timeless beauty of everyday objects and share your time with the House of Jigsaw community! Prepare to experience a puzzle-solving adventure that combines artistry and elegance in a way that is truly unmatched.



  • Explore the beauty of timeless objects
  • Multiple puzzle selection
  • Cutouts up to 1000 pieces
  • Different edge cutouts
  • Change background color
  • Incredible zoom
  • Compare your time score with players on the community page
